ygData.subject: Re: Where to hunt at 20
ygData.msgSnippet: Good thing about Goons, they only leave the compound at night. You sure about that? I could have sworn I ve seen them around before that time. Course
ygData.messageBody:
"Good thing about Goons, they only leave the
compound at night. "<br><br>You sure about that? I could
have sworn I've seen them around before that time.
Course I'm guessing that someone might have pulled it
out of the compound in the day. Cause when it
happened the couple of times, I could have sworn for sure
they were shouting they were gonna give 2k plat to
whomever would go there and hand the mob a plat and get
away as long as they were under level 35 and a good
race. <br><br>shooman out<br><br>PS.. I thought it was
a mean trick b/c they would only give the reward in
Copper but didn't mention that outright.<br><br>Course
it was an impossible task anyway.
